page.title: 07The school
page.content: Continued The original National school was opened in 1842, but has since been rebuilt and extended as a church school in 1914. In 1978 a new staffroom was built and indoor toilets were installed. Central Heating was installed in 1968. Up to 1971 there were only two teachers at the school but now a mobile classroom has been sited in the playground behind the school building. The school does not have its own playing field but a neighbouring farmer has allowed the school to use one of his fields. this is marked out as a football pitch inthe winter and an athletics track in the summer. there is a small playground to the side of the school.
